message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I believe this is a fair price considering its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,500 is already a very competitive price.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,250?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your effort to meet in the middle. However, I am still unable to pay more than $9,000 for the product. I hope we can find a solution that works for both of us.
